content.question: ​A family needs to buy one shovel and between one and eight plants, inclusive, for their new garden. The cost of the shovel is <math alttext="s"><semantics><mi>s</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> dollars, and the cost of one plant is <math alttext="p"><semantics><mi>p</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> dollars. The output values of which of the following give the possible costs for these items, in dollars? (Note: Assume any taxes are included in the costs.)

choices.label: ​The linear function <math alttext="C open parentheses x close parentheses equals s plus p x"><semantics><mrow><mi>C</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="1 less or equal than x less or equal than 8"><semantics><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​The exponential function <math alttext="C open parentheses x close parentheses equals s times p to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>C</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>·</mo><msup><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="1 less or equal than x less or equal than 8"><semantics><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​The arithmetic sequence <math alttext="C subscript n equals s plus p n"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="1 less or equal than n less or equal than 8"><semantics><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​The geometric sequence <math alttext="C subscript n equals s times p to the power of n"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>·</mo><msup><mi>p</mi><mi>n</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="1 less or equal than n less or equal than 8"><semantics><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​The arithmetic sequence <math alttext="C subscript n equals s plus p n"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="1 less or equal than n less or equal than 8"><semantics><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
